kickstart.controller

Class ProgramController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kickstart.controller.ProgramController

  • @Controller
public class ProgramController
extends java.lang.Object
    Program Controller. One of the most important classes. It is responsible for Program. Program is a Interface between different classes and contains the logical data cinema events moviecatalog
    Since:
    02.11.15.
    Author:
    codemunin

      • ProgramController

        @Autowired
public ProgramController(DBComment dbComment,
                                     org.salespointframework.time.BusinessTime businessTime,
                                     DBMovie dbMovie,
                                     DBDate dbDate,
                                     CProgram cProgram)
        The Programm Controller responsible for the management of all programms
        Parameters:
        businessTime - BuisnessTime : The SalesPoint Time
        dbMovie - DBMovie : Movie Database, stores all movies with ids atributes
        dbComment - DBComment comment database
        dbMovie - DBMovie movie database
        dbDate - DBDate CDateStorage database
        cProgram - CProgram the program

      • program

public java.lang.String program(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Leads you to the program.html, actually an overview of all active programms
        Parameters:
        model - Model provided by Spring
        Returns:
        program.html

      • changeprogram

        @RequestMapping(value="/changeprogram")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\')")
public java.lang.String changeprogram(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Responsible for changing the program. Only the logined boss/admin can change it
        Parameters:
        model - Model provided by Spring
        Returns:
        Return "changeprogram" get you back to changeprogram page
